Package maze

Class Box

java.lang.Object
maze.Box
All Implemented Interfaces:
Vertex
Direct Known Subclasses:
BridgeBox, EmptyBox, StairsBox, WallBox, WaterBox
public abstract class Box
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vertex
This abstract class implements a graph's vertex. It provides general features such as coordinates or flags.

    • setX

      public boolean setX​(int x)
      Sets the X coordinate to a given value. If the value is incorrect (i.e. negative), the coordinate is not changed.
      Parameters:
      x - is the coordinate to be set.
      Returns:
      true if x was a correct value, false otherwise.

    • getPracticability

      public abstract int getPracticability()
      Returns the practicability of the box, i.e. the weight to be applied in the graph.
      Returns:
      the practicability of the box.

      public java.util.EnumSet<BoxFlag> getFlags()

      Returns:
      the flags of the box.

    • hasFlag

      public boolean hasFlag​(BoxFlag flag)
      Indicates whether the box carries a given flag.
      Parameters:
      flag - is the flag to be looked for.
      Returns:
      true if the box carries the flag, false otherwise. If the flag is invalid, returns false.

    • hasNoFlag

      public boolean hasNoFlag()

    • setFlags

      public void setFlags​(java.util.EnumSet<BoxFlag> flags)
      Sets the flags to a given value. There is no guarantee for the value of flags to be under MAX_FLAG.
      Parameters:
      flags - is the new value.

    • setFlags

      public void setFlags​(int value)

    • addFlag

      public void addFlag​(BoxFlag flag)
      Adds a flag to the box. The method does not guarantee the new value of flags is under MAX_FLAG.
      Parameters:
      flag - is the flag to be added. It should contain only one 1 in its binary form.

    • remFlag

      public void remFlag​(BoxFlag flag)
      Removes a flag to the box if it is carried.
      Parameters:
      flag - is the flag to be removed.

    • clearFlags

      public void clearFlags()
      Clears all flags.

    • writeGeneralData

      protected void writeGeneralData​(java.io.OutputStream out) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes the coordinates and the flags of the box in an output stream.
      Parameters:
      out - is the output stream in which the values are written.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
